xsds.baseXsd:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="autnresponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="action" type="NonEmptyString" /> <xs:element name="response" type="NonEmptyString" /> <xs:element name="responsedata" type="xs:anyType" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element>
<xs:complexType name="error_responsedata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="error" type="error"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="error"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="errorid" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="rawerrorid" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="errorstring" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="errordescription" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="errorcode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="errortime" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
xsds.sharedXsd:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:simpleType name="NonEmptyString"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="question_state"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Incoming"/> <xs:enumeration value="Answerable"/> <xs:enumeration value="NeedsAnswer"/> <xs:enumeration value="Answered"/> <xs:enumeration value="Rejected"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="question_equivalence_class_state"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Incoming" /> <xs:enumeration value="Published" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:complexType name="qec_metadata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="field" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="key" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

actionXsd.xsd:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:include schemaLocation="sharedXsd.xsd"/>
<xs:simpleType name="job_status"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Not finished"/> <xs:enumeration value="Finished"/> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:complexType name="job"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="token" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="status" type="job_status"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="getJobStatus_responsedata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="job" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="job"></xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
</xs:schema>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:include schemaLocation="sharedXsd.xsd"/>
<!-- Question resources --> <xs:complexType name="question"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="created_time" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="modified_time" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="text" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="state" type="question_state"/> <xs:element name="question_equivalence_class_id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="questions"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="total_resources" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="question" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="question"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<!-- Question equivalence class and answer resources --> <xs:complexType name="question_ids"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="question_id" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="NonEmptyString"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="qec_answer"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="text" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="metadata" minOccurs="0" type="qec_metadata"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="question_equivalence_class"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="created_time" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="modified_time" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="rule" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="state" type="question_equivalence_class_state"/> <xs:element name="reference_question" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="usage_count" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="question_ids" type="question_ids"/> <xs:element name="answer" type="qec_answer"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="question_equivalence_classes"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="total_resources" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="usage_period_start" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="usage_period_end" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="question_equivalence_class" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="question_equivalence_class"></xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<!-- Rule suggestion --> <xs:simpleType name="rule_suggestion"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType>
<!-- Schema resources --> <xs:complexType name="schemaInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="action" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="type" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="schema" type="NonEmptyString"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="schemas"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="schemaInfo" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="schemaInfo"></xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="actionXsd"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="action" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="xsd" type="NonEmptyString"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="xsds"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="baseXsd" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="sharedXsd" type="NonEmptyString"/> <xs:element name="actionXsd" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="actionXsd"></xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<!-- General resources --> <xs:complexType name="resource"> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="questions" type="questions"/> <xs:element name="question_equivalence_classes" type="question_equivalence_classes"/> <xs:element name="schemas" type="schemas"/> <xs:element name="xsds" type="xsds"/> <xs:element name="rule_suggestion" type="rule_suggestion"/> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="getResources_responsedata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="resource" type="resource"></xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
</xs:schema>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:include schemaLocation="sharedXsd.xsd"/>
<xs:complexType name="question_states"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="stat" minOccurs="5" maxOccurs="5"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="count" type="xs:int"/> <xs:attribute name="state" type="question_state"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="question_equivalence_class_states"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="stat" minOccurs="2" maxOccurs="2"> <xs:complexType> <xs:attribute name="count" type="xs:int" /> <xs:attribute name="state" type="question_equivalence_class_state" /> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="stats"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="question_states" type="question_states"/> <xs:element name="question_equivalence_class_states" type="question_equivalence_class_states" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="getStats_responsedata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="stats" type="stats"></xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
</xs:schema>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:include schemaLocation="sharedXsd.xsd"/>
<xs:simpleType name="operationType" final="restriction"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="add" /> <xs:enumeration value="update" /> <xs:enumeration value="delete" /> <xs:enumeration value="undelete" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:simpleType name="resourceType" final="restriction"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="question" /> <xs:enumeration value="question_equivalence_class" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>
<xs:complexType name="ManagedResources"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="type" type="resourceType" /> <xs:element name="operation" type="operationType" /> <xs:element name="id" type="NonEmptyString" maxOccurs="unbounded" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="ManagementResult"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation> "managed_resources" is a list of ManagedResources instances describing what was done to each resource "operation" is the operation that will be completed on the resources. "type" is the type of resource that the operation will be completed on. "job_token" is the token to pass into getJobStatus to get the status of this job. </xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="managed_resources" type="ManagedResources" maxOccurs="unbounded" /> <xs:element name="operation" type="operationType" /> <xs:element name="type" type="resourceType" /> <xs:element name="job_token" type="NonEmptyString" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="manageResources_responsedata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="ManagementResult" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
</xs:schema>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:include schemaLocation="sharedXsd.xsd"/>
<xs:complexType name="question_set"> <xs:sequence minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element name="text" type="NonEmptyString" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="test_rule_outcome"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="rule" type="xs:string" /> <xs:element name="matched" type="question_set" /> <xs:element name="not_matched" type="question_set" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:complexType name="testRule_responsedata"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="outcome" type="test_rule_outcome"></xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
</xs:schema>
